Research_direction:
科研工作 RESEARCH FOCUS
主要从事植物纤维资源生物炼制领域的教学、科研与社会服务工作，研究方向：（1）木质纤维资源利用微生物：C5糖代谢微生物基础理论、转录组学与功能基因发掘；（2）木质纤维素糖平台化合物：糖酸、稀有糖生物合成及产品创制；（3）生物质燃料与化学品：燃料乙醇、有机酸、多羟基化合物及其生物聚酯新材料；（4）功能性糖：绿色生产技术、新产品创制及应用（饲料、食品、医药品）；（5）农林废弃物资源化利用系统集成技术：秸秆及林业生产废弃物的工业化利用、果蔬及废弃物精深加工。
Dr. Yong Xu general area is Microbiology and Biotechnology of lignocellulose biorefinery, especially on the biochemical, biofuel and biomaterial making from the polysaccharides constitute. His group in NJFU is seeking for the novel approach to develop the consolidated bioprocessing for the commercial production of fuel-ethanol, functional oligosaccharides, edible carbohydrate gels, polyols and so on. In present, they are running a commercial xylo-oligosacchride (XOS) plant to produce functional animal feed additives over 18 years, and also a versatile platform chemical of xylonic acid (XA) was well developed at pilot scale fermentation. By bacterial COS-SSTR bioprocess, 600 g/L xylonite fermentation performance achieved amazingly from xylose in his lab. The metabolic pathway and sophisticated regulation of various lignocellulosic sugars fermenting strains is also of our highlights.
科研方向 FIELDS OF INTEREST
1) Biorefinery of lignocellulosic biomass for biochemicals, biofuels and biomaterials
2) Microbiology and Molecular biology of lignocellulose-degrading bacteria and fungi
3) Whole-cell catalysis and oxidation of saccharides, polyols, furans and so on
4) Consolidated processes of agro-forest and municipal wastes
5) Functional oligosaccharides and its applications
6) Biomodification and bioconversion of natural organic chemicals

Introduction: 工学博士，教授，博士研究生导师，入选江苏省“333”工程第三层次、江苏省“六大人才高峰”（A类）。1994年毕业于南京林业大学化学工程学院林产化工专业并留校任教，2001年获工学硕士学位，2005年获工学博士学位。2006.03-09赴加拿大University of British Columbia，2012.09-2013.09赴美国Georgia Institute of Technology研修和合作研究。主持国家自然科学基金、国家重点研发计划项目课题、江苏省重点研发计划、江苏省自然科学基金项目、教育部新农科研究与改革实践项目等十余项。先后获得国家技术发明奖二等奖、国家高等教育教学成果奖、中国林业青年科技奖、中国发明奖优秀奖等。指导获江苏省优秀博士学位论文、硕士专业学位论文和本科毕业论文6篇。
